title: How to Cancel PlayStation Now on PS4

steps.headline: Turn on your PS4 and TV.
steps.description: If your PS4 is already powered on, you can skip this step.

steps.headline: Navigate to Settings and press ×.
steps.description: To get there, press UP on the left stick or directional pad from the Home screen, and scroll over to "Settings" next to an icon of a tool case.

steps.headline: Navigate to PlayStation Network/Account Management and press ×.
steps.description: This is usually the fourth listing in the menu.

steps.headline: Navigate to Account Information and press ×.
steps.description: This is usually the second listing in the menu.

steps.headline: Navigate to PlayStation Subscriptions and press ×.
steps.description: You can use the left stick to navigate to the bottom of the menu. You'll see a list of all your active subscriptions.

steps.headline: Navigate to your PlayStation Now subscription and press ×.
Press × again to select Turn Off Auto-Renew.
steps.description: Since this is the only button you can interact with on this page, it will be automatically selected. You'll get a confirmation screen that auto-renew for your PlayStation Now subscription has been turned off and you can turn it back on at any time. Press × to close this message. You'll be redirected back to the subscription's details screen where you will see the subscription's end date as well as the option to turn on auto-renew.

text: Turn on your PS4 and TV. If your PS4 is already powered on, you can skip this step. Navigate to Settings and press ×. To get there, press UP on the left stick or directional pad from the Home screen, and scroll over to "Settings" next to an icon of a tool case. Navigate to PlayStation Network/Account Management and press ×. This is usually the fourth listing in the menu. Navigate to Account Information and press ×. This is usually the second listing in the menu. Navigate to PlayStation Subscriptions and press ×. You can use the left stick to navigate to the bottom of the menu. You'll see a list of all your active subscriptions. Navigate to your PlayStation Now subscription and press ×. The subscription's details will load. Press × again to select Turn Off Auto-Renew. Since this is the only button you can interact with on this page, it will be automatically selected. You'll get a confirmation screen that auto-renew for your PlayStation Now subscription has been turned off and you can turn it back on at any time. Press × to close this message. You'll be redirected back to the subscription's details screen where you will see the subscription's end date as well as the option to turn on auto-renew.
